thread.title: Venezuela accuses US of 'piracy' after it seizes oil tanker
thread.title_full: Venezuela accuses US of 'piracy' after it seizes oil tanker

author: Whatfinger
title: Venezuela accuses US of 'piracy' after it seizes oil tanker
text:
After months of US strikes on accused drug boats and a build up of military power in the region, Venezuela has accused the US of "piracy" after an oil tanker was seized by American troops off the country’s coast.
The US attorney general says the sanctioned tanker was part of "an illicit oil shipping network supporting foreign terrorist organisations" but the Venezuelan government said the operation "constitutes a blatant theft".
#donaldtrump #unitedstates #venezuela #skynews
